basics.name: Nadir Hussain Laskar
basics.title: Software Development Team Lead
basics.bio: Building Search @ ZAGENO | Powered by ML | WebML | Cloud Native | Lucene | Domain Driven Design. Expertise in AI, Blockchain, Web, VR/AR, and Full-stack development.

projects.title: ReactJS Components Library
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive components library in ReactJS to streamline development process and improve code reusability across projects.

projects.title: Low Code Platform with Voice Interface
projects.description: Led the development of an innovative low code platform that incorporates voice interface for enhanced user interaction and productivity.

projects.title: Micro-Frontend Architecture
projects.description: Implemented a micro-frontend architecture using Single SPA framework to create more maintainable and scalable web applications.

experience.description: Leading the development of search infrastructure, integrating ML and WebML solutions, and leveraging cloud-native architectures.
Developed micro-frontend solutions, optimized search functionalities, and contributed to scalable infrastructure.
Worked on B2B solutions, core feature development, and micro-frontend architecture for order management.
Implemented AI-driven automation solutions and worked on full-stack application development.
Developed a location tracking system using proprietary hardware and WiFi fingerprinting.

certifications: Advanced RAG Applications with Vector Databases
Generative AI: The Evolution of Thoughtful Online Search
Ethics in the Age of Generative AI
Career Essentials in Generative AI by Microsoft and LinkedIn
